actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to repeal the Emergency Daylight Saving Time Conservation Act of 1973; to amend the Uniform Time Act of 1966 to provide for the observance of daylight saving time from the last Sunday of February until the last Sunday of November of each year.

summary.text: Provides for the repeal of the Emergency Daylight Saving Time Conservation Act of 1973. Provides, under the Uniform Time Act of 1966, for the observance of daylight saving time from the last Sunday of February until the last Sunday of November of each year.

titles.title: A bill to repeal the Emergency Daylight Saving Time Conservation Act of 1973; to amend the Uniform Time Act of 1966 to provide for the observance of daylight saving time from the last Sunday of February until the last Sunday of November of each year.
